display_long_description:
# 👊 The Ultimate Stress-Buster!
Play HIT and take out your stress by pummelling, slapping, and whacking squishy clay heads in a VR sandbox. Thanks to our wild soft body physics, every hit deforms and reshapes the heads in hilariously unpredictable ways!  
  
[media]
  
# 🪓Choose Your Weapon  
Fists, frying pans, baseball bats—even a flopping fish! Try 16 weapons each with their own unique impacts. Also try community suggested weapons like the anvil, assault rifle, knife, sledgehammer, or nunchaku!
  
[media]
  
# 👤44+ Unique Heads to Wreck  
Each one reacts to your hits with funny voices and expressions including 10 Content Creators you might recognise!)  
  
[media]
  
# 🚗Take a break from hitting heads, smash a car instead!  
Use your hands, weapons, or anything you can find to beat the car into tiny pieces. Take your time to smash it, or try to beat the clock in a timed challenge.  

[media]

# 🏝️Chill Vibes or Dark Places  
Destroy in peace, surrounded by a tranquil paradise OR pull the lever to enter scary Dystopia world!  
  
[media]
  
Join our Discord and tell us what to add next: https://discord.gg/ay3PfTKzw3

[media]

# 👊 The Ultimate Stress-Buster!
Play HIT and take out your stress by pummelling, slapping, and whacking squishy clay heads in a VR sandbox. Thanks to our wild soft body physics, every hit deforms and reshapes the heads in hilariously unpredictable ways!

# 🪓Choose Your Weapon  
Fists, frying pans, baseball bats—even a flopping fish! Try 16 weapons each with their own unique impacts. Also try community suggested weapons like the anvil, assault rifle, knife, sledgehammer, or nunchaku!
